languages.text: "На вас сложно не отвлекаться, Ваша Светлость. Вы имеете обыкновение радикально изменять любую ситуацию, какой касаетесь".
"You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."
languages.original_text: "На вас сложно не отвлекаться, Ваша Светлость. Вы имеете обыкновение радикально изменять любую ситуацию, какой касаетесь".

traits.locale_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs wherever and whenever you become involved."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs wherever and whenever you become involved."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs wherever and whenever you become involved."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs wherever and whenever you become involved."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我们很难无视您的存在，大人。无论发生什么事情，只要您参与其中，就会从根本上改变事态的发展。”
languages.original_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."

traits.locale_text: “我们很难无视您的存在，大人。无论发生什么事情，只要您参与其中，就会彻底改变事态的发展。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下、あなたという人はどうにも無視できない存在だ。突っ込む先の状況が何であれ、ガラッと変えてしまう癖を持っている」
languages.original_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あなたという人はどうにも無視できない存在だ。突っ込む先の状況が何であれ、ガラッと変えてしまう癖を持っている」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Es difícil de ignorar, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tiene la costumbre de alterar radicalmente el estado de toda situación en la que se involucra».
languages.original_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."

traits.locale_text: «Es difícil de ignorar, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tiene la costumbre de alterar radicalmente el estado de las cosas cuando se involucra».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr seid schwer zu ignorieren, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr habt die Angewohnheit, den Status quo jeder Situation radikal zu verändern."
languages.original_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid schwer zu ignorieren, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr habt die Angewohnheit, den Status quo radikal zu verändern, wann immer und wo immer Ihr auftaucht."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Il est difficile de faire abstraction de votre présence, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez le chic pour changer radicalement la donne à chacune de vos interventions. »
languages.original_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."

traits.locale_text: « Il est difficile de faire abstraction de votre présence, Votre Seigneurie. Chaque fois que vous vous mêlez à quelque chose, vous avez tendance à changer radicalement la situation. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi görmezden gelmek zor olur. Karıştığınız her olayın kaderini hayli değiştirmek gibi bir huyunuz var."
languages.original_text: "You are hard to ignore, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have a habit of radically altering the state of affairs of whatever situation you wade into."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi görmezden gelmek zor olur. Karıştığınız her olayın kaderini hayli değiştirmek gibi bir huyunuz var."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
